input.sentences: the bikers were ready to give it their all in this race .
there were a lot of bikers in attendance for this one .
they all seemed choreographed as they took off .
crossing the finish line was a pleasure to watch .
an honorary parade was given afterwards .
output.sentences: The rider began the race strong.
He atayed in the lead as the race continues.
After many miles, the pack was still tight.
He didn't win but he rode well, finishing just after the winner.
The town threw a parade to celebrate the winners.
